originalText: Why did you have to die, you bastard...

::He greets you with his arms wide open.:: You did it $(context.player.Name)! Damn, South Railroad Outpost and the embassy were a painful thorn in our sides, but now it all belongs to the Free Drones! Yeah!

::The man removes his mask as soon as you come near him. He smiles after doing so, displaying an admirable set of rotten teeth springing from a rectangular jaw covered with a several days old beard. His clothes are patchy in some and torn in other places. As for his words, they are carried by a rough-sounding but unmistakably friendly voice.::

Hey, you magnificent bastard! Welcome to the under-passages! Name's Harry Becket, and if it wasn't for me, all these derailed peeps would've been taking on the Cans with nuthin' but rocks and a bit of hope! ::He laughs.::
You vicious bastard! ::He laughs.:: I heard what you did to those bleedin' Lurkers! You strolled right into their turf and busted out our pals!
I got some new stuff you might wanna take a look at 'ere. Make sure you've the charons ready, of course!
Hey, check out that new girl - discount Izumi! ::He proceeds to laugh for solid ten seconds.::
Whatcha need?

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_trenton_dead

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_giveFinalReward
That's the first step. Next stop - Fort Apogee!
We shouldn't relax too much, the Protectorate is still strong in South Underrail.
If it wasn't for me, you'd all be sitting in this hole doing nuthin'.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_met
I also heard you are quite a ferocious $(#pal/gal)! Those bleedin' Lurkers never knew what hit 'em! ::He laughs.:: You strolled right into their turf and busted out our captured pals!
I sell all sorts of stuff - good stuff, so feel free to spend some charons! :: He laughs.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowBecket

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_met

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_rewardLurker
Thank you, but it wasn't exactly like that...
Yeah, I'm cool and I know it! But please, don't stop...
I'm just here for the stuff.
Let's check it out. ::Barter.::
I wanted to ask you something first.
Just kidd'n!

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_talkedKaya

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_AttackSROCompleted

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_giveFinalReward
Yeah, once we burn it down, the Protectorate is pretty much gone from South Underrail!
Sure, you've a point there... But, the peeps need a bit of a celebration 'cause we smashed the Cans like no big deal!
Erm... ::He laughs.:: For a second there I though you were serious, you silly bastard!

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_rewardLurker

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_rewardLurker

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_LurkerEscapeCompleted

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.loc_lup-a8prison_prisonersEscaped

Don't be so humble, you silly bastard. Brag! Brag until everyone gives you *the* look! I've an energy shield just for you! Hey, good deeds shouldn't go unrewarded, so I hope you like it! ::He gives you an energy shield emitter.::

::He laughs.:: I'd have to stop if I want to give you your reward. I've an energy shield just for you! Hey, good deeds shouldn't go unrewarded, so I hope you like it! ::He gives you an energy shield emitter.::
::He laughs.:: Coming right up! I've an energy shield just for you! Hey, good deeds shouldn't go unrewarded, so I hope you like it! ::He gives you an energy shield emitter.::
Whacha wanna ask me?

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.loc_xpbl_ojyc_resolution
freeDrone

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_talkedKaya
Trenton told me to see you about some gear.
I'm here to pick up the explosives.
Maura told me to see you.
Show me what you got. ::Barter.::
::[Mercantile]:: Hey, Becket, where do you keep the good stuff? Don't try to tell me that a guy like yourself doesn't have something on the side, waiting for the right buyer.
Why did you join the Free Drones?
What can you tell me about Kokoschka?
What can you tell me about Darling?
What can you tell me about Hutch?
What can you tell me about Maura?
What can you tell me about Trenton?
What can you tell me about Bate?
What can you tell me about Marcella?
Goodbye, Becket.
I've been instructed by Trenton to prepare some fine equipment for you. Take a pick: You've armor, weapons and psi equipment to choose from. What'll it be?

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_rewardLurker

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.loc_lup-a8prison_prisonersEscaped

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_LurkerEscapeCompleted
Yup, I've been told you'd come. At the moment, I can offer you some armor, some weapons or if you're a $(#psi-kinda-guy/psi-gal), I've some of that stuff too.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_gaveFirstGear
Going out to cause some trouble? ::He laughs.:: Here you go, you bastard. Make the Cans pay for everything they did!

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_gaveExplosives

Right! She arranged for you to get some extra gear. But shush - not a word to anyone about this! ::He laughs.:: Um... thanks for saving her. She's a, um, a dear friend of mine and... it was difficult without her. I'm just glad she's with us again.

Khm, anyway, at the moment I can offer you some armor, some weapons or if you're a $(#psi-kinda-guy/psi-gal), I've some of that stuff too.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_giveMauraReward

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_inspectedInventory
::He laughs.:: You clever bastard, you sure got the nose for these things, eh? I've the stuff you want right 'ere.
::He laughs.:: You silly bastard, the stuff I've already 'ere is *the* good stuff. You know it! So show me the charons and let's do some business.

You know, I used to be a United Stations supporter. Yeah, I know - I actually believed all that unification rubbish. It somehow made sense, you know... If all the stations united, we'd be able to fight off raiders and beasts. Protectorate would - you guessed it - protect us! That's big stuff, bigger than a Deep Caverns echo... but unfortunately, that's not how things work in real life.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowKokoschka

That magnificent bastard had to die, didn't he? Ehh, I remember when I first met him. Weird bastard! I greeted him with that, and he responded with something like, "Why you call me bastard, you schklamanpz?" or something like that. I had to explain to him that I wasn't trying to offend him and how I mean these things in a good way. He was a good bastard, you know.

::He laughs.:: Bastard! I told him that when I met him for the first time, and he responded with something like, "Why you call me bastard, you schklamanpz?" or something like that. I had to explain to him that I wasn't trying to offend him and how I mean these things in a good way. He's a good bastard, you know.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowDarling

Oh, she's a fine woman. Yes. There's this motherly feel about her, you know what I mean. Like she's the one who takes care of us, she listens, gives advice and reassures you everything is gonna be fine.
Poor Hutch, he was a good kid. He was a blueprint for a perfect freedom fighter. Young, strong, cunning, honest, idealistic.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowMaura

Maura is an acquaintance of mine, we used to do business in Junkyard, Core City, Camp Hathor... everywhere. We specialized in sought after, less common and merchandise. One day, she left to join the Free Drones, she was sick and tired of the Protectorate propaganda, she wanted to make a change.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowTrenton

Oh, Corben's one tough bastard. When he comes up with a plan, you know he's been working on it for a long time, ignoring hunger, thirst or sleep until it's just right. Perfect! He can predict what the enemy's gonna do, and that always makes him one step ahead of the Cans.

And there's nuthin' fake about him, too. He does what he does and speaks the way it is. That might not always be what you want to hear, but you know it's the truth.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowBate
That git! That lying, Protectorate-loving git! I thought he was one of us!

Bate is a different type of leader than Trenton is. While Trenton is straight to the point strategic mastermind, Alvin Bate has that common man... leader sort of thing. Erm, what I really mean, he behaves like he was one of us... us regular peeps. The bastard! ::Laughs.:: Not saying Trenton isn't, but... he keeps to himself.

Um, I don't know how much I can tell you about that, $(context.player.Name). She disappeared about two months ago, and everyone is clueless about what exactly happened. Some say she was a Protectorate spy, some say she died fighting the Cans, bravely.
Show me the weapons.
I'm interested in armor.
I'll take the psi stuff.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_GetEquipmentFromJunkyardStarted

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_gaveFirstGear

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_SabotageElevatorStarted

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_gaveExplosives

So... that's five charges and a detonator, if I'm not mistaken. Lemme see... one... two... three, four... where did I put you... ah, there it is - five! Detonator - check! That's it. I've everything you need. ::He gives you the explosives and the detonator.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowMaura

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_becket_giveMauraReward
::Barter.::

I've seen the price of the safety they offer, of their... protection! And I think it's too damn high. Protectorate will make us lie belly down in the mud and walk over us, and then tell us it's a good life. Bandits won't touch us, true, but that's a lot of mud to eat. To hell with it, I don't want that! So I hooked up with my old acquaintance, Maura, and came here. The peeps need supplies, and that's what I do best!

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_kokoschka_died
Unfortunately, um... he's a dead bastard now... Damn...

I guess he wasn't used to that in... wherever he's from, I forgot. The funny things is, now he tries to do the same but... he forces it a bit too much.

Just yesterday he smiled at me and said: "Hey, you man that smells like rotting brbuznit! I mean it well, don't get angried." "Angried"!

And she's young and good lookin', and cooks really damn well! Darn it, I wish I had a caring mother like that, mine was a crone that never loved me. I was the middle child! Anyway, I just wish she'd take it easy with the bleedin' smokes, she's been puffing those things a bit too much lately.

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowHutch

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_GetEquipmentFromJunkyardCompleted
And in love... That's what killed him, I heard he volunteered to go to Junkyard. Bastard... At least he didn't die alone.
Rubbish, I said. She's gone crazy, I thought! But, I was just blind myself. Bastard... Ironically, she was the one who brought me here. She's a capable woman, I'd trust her with anything...
He's just magnificent! We need more Trentons in the world, that's for sure!

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.quest_fd_revealSpyCompleted
For so long he's been feeding the Cans with information about us... Ugh! I'm furious! We lost so many good peeps because of him.
Bate, on the other hand, will brief us about serious issues, then get wasted with us later. And that bastard can drink two burrowers worth of mushroom brew. At least! ::Laughs.::

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowTrenton

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.faction_freeDrones_knowMarcella

description: 前後のテキストの状況を示すヒントになるかも
originalText: context.npc_fd_marcella_Found
I don't really know what to think. But I know that, if she ever shows up again... It's won't be pretty. I'm sure of it.
Pistols, submachine guns, assault rifles, crossbows, sniper rifles,
I've metal armor, leather armor, riot gear and tactical vests.
I've spare psi boosters and inhalants - seven and five, respectively - and some psionic headbands.
Oh, I will make them pay, Becket. I'm on fire!
Death to Protectorate!
Wish me luck, Becket.
At least those things aren't easy to come by, so that's helping.
shotguns, machetes,
sledgehammers, combat knifes and combat gloves. Harry "The Supplier" Becket has it all! ::He laughs.::
I'll take a suit of metal armor.
I'll take a suit of leather armor.
I'll take riot gear.
I'll take a tactical vest.
Actually, I'm interested in weapons.
Actually, I'm interested in the psi stuff.
I'll take the boosters and inhalants.
I'll take a psionic headband.
Actually, I'm interested in armor.
Good luck, you brave bastard. Stay free!
